item.description: Balaji's Profile Javascript Animation Tutorials Games Contact -- Balaji Sankar Front End Developer@nfnlabs Follw me at -- {{ partial "footer.html" . }} @import url(https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.6.3/css/font-awesome.css); body { background: #e7e7e7; font-family: "Raleway", "Lato", sans-serif; position: relative; text-align: center; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; height: 100vh; /* min-width: 500px; */ } nav{ position: absolute; top: 0; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; color: white; width: 100%; z-index: 7; background: black; } .
